intents.label: greeting
intents.response: Hey! How can I help you today?

intents.label: information
intents.response: My name is Foodie. I can assist you in placing an order.

intents.label: order
questions: I would like to buy something.
intents.response: Sure! What would you like to have?

intents.label: menu
intents.response: You can order anything from the menu: Chicken Sandwich, Spicy Chicken Sandwich, Fries, Cheesy Fries, Chicken Nuggets, Strawberry milkshake, Chocolate milkshake, Chocloate Chip Cookie and Coke.

intents.label: add
questions: Can I get a Chicken Sandwich?
Could I get a Chicken Sandwich?
Can I have a Chicken Sandwich?
I would like to have a Chicken Sandwich.
Can you add a Chicken Sandwich to the order?
Can I get a Spicy Chicken Sandwich?
Could I get a Spicy Chicken Sandwich?
Can I have a Spicy Chicken Sandwich?
I would like to have a Spicy Chicken Sandwich.
Can you add a Spicy Chicken Sandwich to the order?
Give me a Spicy Chicken Sandwich.
Can I have a Large Fries?
I would like to have a small Fries?
Can you add Fries to the order?
Can I get a Cheesy Fries?
Could I get a Cheesy Fries?
Can I have a Cheesy Fries?
I would like to have a Cheesy Fries.
I would like to have Chicken Nuggets?
Can I get a Strawberry milkshake?
Could I get a Strawberry milkshake?
Can I have a Strawberry milkshake?
I would like to have a Strawberry milkshake.
Can you add Strawberry milkshake to the order?
Can I get a Chocolate milkshake?
Could I get a Chocolate milkshake?

I would like to have a Chocolate milkshake.
Can I get a Chocolate Chip Cookie?

Can I have a Chocolate Chip Cookie?
I would like to have a Chocolate Chip Cookie?
Can you add Chocolate Chip Cookie?
Give me a Chocolate Chip Cookie?
I would like to have a Coke.
Can you add Coke to the order?

intents.label: delete
questions: Can you remove a Chicken Sandwich?
Can you delete a Chicken Sandwich?
Do not give me Chicken Sandwich.
Can you remove a Spicy Chicken Sandwich?
Can you delete a Spicy Chicken Sandwich?
Do not give me Spicy Chicken Sandwich.
Can you remove a Cheesy Fries?
Do not give me Cheesy Fries.
Do not give me Chicken Nuggets.
Can you remove a Strawberry milkshake?
Can you delete a Strawberry milkshake?
Do not give me Strawberry milkshake.
Can you remove a Chocolate milkshake?
Can you delete a Chocolate milkshake?
Do not give me Chocolate milkshake.
Can you remove a Chocloate Chip Cookie?

intents.label: recipt
questions: Would you put it on separate bills, please?
can i get the bill please
intents.response: then, you total comes to 10 dollars.

intents.label: goodbye
intents.response: Thankyou for ordering! see you next time!
